General.Name: AXP Energy Limited
General.Description: AXP Energy Limited operates as an oil and gas production and development company in the United States. It holds 100% interest in the Appalachian Basin comprising 100,000 acres located primarily in the Eastern part of Kentucky, Western Virginia, and Northeastern part of Tennessee; Denver-Julesburg Basin, which covers an area of approximately 20,000 acres located in Central Colorado; and Illinois Basin, which covers an area of approximately 4,000 acres. The company was formerly known as Fremont Petroleum Corporation Ltd and changed its name to AXP Energy Limited in July 2021. AXP Energy Limited was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Lexington, Kentucky.
